abstract: Stocks fall as investors dump shares in real estate and utility companies.

headline.print_headline: Real Estate and Utilities  Drag Wall Street Down
headline.main: Real Estate and Utilities Drag Wall Street Down

snippet: Shares of Merrimack Pharmaceuticals fell after the company said it would cut almost a quarter of its work force and would look for a new chief executive....
lead_paragraph: Shares of Merrimack Pharmaceuticals fell after the company said it would cut almost a quarter of its work force and would look for a new chief executive.
